sentences.sContent: The supernovae make the chemical elements through real alchemy, transforming one element, the light elements into the heavy ones.
sentences.sContent_eng: The supernovae make the chemical elements through real alchemy, transforming one element, the light elements into the heavy ones.
sentences.sCn: 超新星通过真正的点金术制造化学元素，把一种元素，轻的元素转变成重的。

sentences.sContent: At the same time alchemy was much influenced by ideas from the East about magic and astrology foretelling the future from the stars.
sentences.sContent_eng: At the same time alchemy was much influenced by ideas from the East about magic and astrology foretelling the future from the stars.
sentences.sCn: 与此同时．炼金术也受到了来自东方的关于巫术和占星术（根据星象预知未来）的观念的很大影响。

remMethod.val: al + chemy (化学) → 起化学反应来炼金 → 炼金术

trans.tranOther: a science studied in the Middle Ages, that involved trying to change ordinary metals into gold
